-| wceq(c5, co(c0, cnmoo, c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈ NrmCVec ∧(c2 : c3 → c4))→(c5 ` c2)∈ ℝ*)
⊣ c3 =(BaseSet ` c0)
⊣ c4 =(BaseSet ` c1)
⊣ c5 =(c0[normOpOLD]c1)

comment: The norm of an operator is an extended real. (Contributed by NM, 27-Nov-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
